title: 888bold888
author: 888bold888
content: Hello,I'm a beginner trying to get started with mining using my GekkoScience R909 that I have connected to my Raspberry Pi running Umbrel.I need step by step help and would be very grateful if anyone can help me with this.Thank you in advance!888bold888

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Glad to see you later posted in the correct R909 thread  Ya probably should lock this thread so it is not necroed from time to time...That said detailed information is here https://kano.is/gekko.php

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: The most important thing is to use the good version of cgminer and not a shitty one which could lead to the loss of your coinshttps://github.com/kanoi/cgminer is what you should use if you have any doubt.Happy hashing !

comments.author: 888bold888
comments.body: Hello all - I ended up deciding to use my macbook to set it up instead of trying to use the umbrel raspberry pi - it was much more straightforward.Thank you all for your help!
